Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: ANGELA MORAN
Reviews.Content: I guess the old saying is true that you get what you pay for. The product is inexpensive and easy to connect and operate but poor quality review of recordings.

Reviews.Title: easy to use and range is good
Reviews.Author: anthony collier
Reviews.Content: however, if quality is not required this unit is great. daytime videos are better but nigth time is worthless. I tested several times, 25 ft from house to the car and could not recognize myself.So whats the point if these photos videos cannot be recognized?

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: F. Mendez
Reviews.Content: It took 30 minutes to put it together. Image is better of what I expected. I had a few questions about the recording / I called them and they went over the steps needed with me. 10 minutes on the phone and I was ready to go.

ProductInfo.Features:
Do-it-yourself (D.I.Y) easy to use and simple installation
Integrated digital video recorder, SD memory card not included
2.4GHz digital wireless recording system. No video cables required
Weatherproof (IP54) CMOS color camera for outdoor and indoor applications
Secure signal: neighbors cannot pick up the signal or listen in
ProductInfo.Name: Securityman DigiairWatch2 4-Channel Wireless DVR with 2 Wireless Camera, Night Vision, Audio and SD Card Recorder (Black)
